articles.title: 3000-foot wide asteroid, 4 other space rocks hurtling towards Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA has revealed details about 5 asteroids that are hurtling towards Earth and are expected to make close approaches in the next few days. One of them is a mammoth 3000-foot wide asteroid that will pass by at an extremely close distance!
